metadata.description: Safety and observability plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: safer-git
plugins.description: Blocks dangerous git commands (force-push, amend, reset --hard, etc.) for all agents

plugins.name: subagent-metrics
plugins.description: Logs token usage for every subagent (Task tool) call to ~/.claude/subagent-metrics.jsonl

plugins.name: test-runner
plugins.description: Run tests with coverage and baseline tracking (pytest, with JS/TS support planned)

plugins.name: commit
plugins.description: Smart conventional commits with automatic change analysis and splitting
